description: This header file declares internal functions and interfaces for the Http Simple Server Object, including property management, lifecycle management, and communication handling functions.

methods.name: HttpSsoGetWspIf
methods.description: Retrieves the Web Service Provider Interface handle associated with the Http SSO object.

methods.name: HttpSsoSetWspIf
methods.description: Sets the Web Service Provider Interface handle for the Http SSO object.

methods.name: HttpSsoGetHfpIf
methods.description: Retrieves the HTTP Function Protocol Interface handle.

methods.name: HttpSsoSetHfpIf
methods.description: Sets the HTTP Function Protocol Interface handle.

methods.name: HttpSsoGetFumIf
methods.description: Retrieves the FUM Interface handle.

methods.name: HttpSsoSetFumIf
methods.description: Sets the FUM Interface handle.

methods.name: HttpSsoGetServerMode
methods.description: Gets the current server mode of the Http SSO object.

methods.name: HttpSsoSetServerMode
methods.description: Sets the server mode of the Http SSO object.

methods.name: HttpSsoGetProperty
methods.description: Gets the properties of the Http SSO object.

methods.name: HttpSsoSetProperty
methods.description: Sets the properties of the Http SSO object.

methods.name: HttpSsoResetProperty
methods.description: Resets the properties of the Http SSO object to default.

methods.name: HttpSsoReset
methods.description: Resets the entire Http SSO object.

methods.name: HttpSsoEngage
methods.description: Engages the Http SSO, starting its operation.

methods.name: HttpSsoCancel
methods.description: Cancels the operation of the Http SSO.

methods.name: HttpSsoWorkerInit
methods.description: Initializes worker resources for the Http SSO.

methods.name: HttpSsoWorkerUnload
methods.description: Unloads worker resources for cleanup.

methods.name: HttpSsoAcquireWsso
methods.description: Acquires a Web Service Session Object.

methods.name: HttpSsoReleaseWsso
methods.description: Releases a Web Service Session Object.

methods.name: HttpSsoManufactureWssoPool
methods.description: Creates a pool of Web Service Session Objects.

methods.name: HttpSsoDestroyWssoPool
methods.description: Destroys the pool of Web Service Session Objects.

methods.name: HttpSsoAcquireWsto
methods.description: Acquires a Web Service Transport Object.

methods.name: HttpSsoReleaseWsto
methods.description: Releases a Web Service Transport Object.

methods.name: HttpSsoManufactureWstoPool
methods.description: Creates a pool of Web Service Transport Objects.

methods.name: HttpSsoDestroyWstoPool
methods.description: Destroys the Web Service Transport Object pool.

methods.name: HttpSsoAcquireBmoReq
methods.description: Acquires a Basic Message Object Request.

methods.name: HttpSsoReleaseBmoReq
methods.description: Releases a Basic Message Object Request.

methods.name: HttpSsoManufactureBmoReqPool
methods.description: Creates a pool of BMO Request objects.

methods.name: HttpSsoDestroyBmoReqPool
methods.description: Destroys the BMO Request object pool.

methods.name: HttpSsoAcquireBmoRep
methods.description: Acquires a Basic Message Object Response.

methods.name: HttpSsoReleaseBmoRep
methods.description: Releases a BMO Response object.

methods.name: HttpSsoManufactureBmoRepPool
methods.description: Creates a pool of BMO Response objects.

methods.name: HttpSsoDestroyBmoRepPool
methods.description: Destroys the BMO Response object pool.

methods.name: HttpSsoWspAccept
methods.description: Accepts incoming Web Service Protocol requests.

methods.name: HttpSsoWspServe
methods.description: Serves Web Service sessions.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoAccept
methods.description: Accepts socket connections for destination to WebObject communication.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoSetOut
methods.description: Sets output for socket communication.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoRemove
methods.description: Removes socket connections.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoQuery
methods.description: Queries socket for data.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoProcessSync
methods.description: Processes socket data synchronously.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoProcessAsync
methods.description: Processes socket data asynchronously.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoSendComplete
methods.description: Completes sending data over socket.

methods.name: HttpSsoDstowoNotify
methods.description: Notifies events related to socket communication.
